title: Rosena Allin-Khan – 2020 Comments on Fox Hunting
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rosena Allin-Khan, the Labour MP for Tooting, on 26 December 2020.
content: Families kept apart for Christmas, people lonely in care homes unable to see loved ones, limited funerals and cancelled weddings…
Yet fox hunting is allowed to flourish. It’s a disease in itself – we must eradicate it.
